thread.section_title: Smart Start, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smart Start, Inc. | smartstartinc.com | 5 of 52
thread.title: Josh Trujillo
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Josh Trujillo

author: Josh Trujillo
title: Josh Trujillo
text: I've been having issues with my in home device all weekend. I've had to hard reset at least 15 to 20 times over the weekend and into today I believe. 4 and 5 resets and shoulder taps per test window. It's ridiculous. Out of all of these calls into smart start, Bobbie Hennig was the most helpful, professional and a joy to speak with. I've pretty much dreaded every other call, but she is why I'm giving you a good rating. If even 50% of the other customer support agents were like her, I'd have given you 5 Stars instead of 4.
